nodes.text: This pin-up of a Rodian was a decorative poster available on the planet Coruscant during the Clone Wars.

It was seen on the wall of a cantina located on Coruscant underworld in 22 BBY. Addressed to an individual named Jason, the image depicted a female Rodian in a blue dress and white stockings. The Aurebesh inscription on the upper-right corner of the image read "To Jason X0X0".

This image was one of several pin-up images seen on the walls Moshi Bar in the episode Lethal Trackdown. In the episode, the poster is seen from far away and the Aurebesh caption is barely readable. The poster is first seen in close-up in an unidentified cantina in Pursuit of Peace.
